Class ec.e.hab.ArrayEnumeration

Class ec.e.hab.ArrayEnumeration 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.hab.ArrayEnumeration
public class ArrayEnumeration
extends Object
implements Enumeration
A utility class that provides an enumeration of an array. Arguably this should be in some more generally useful package than ec.e.hab (arguably this should have been part of the standard Java class library all along).

ArrayEnumeration(Object[])
Construct an Enumeration for a given array.

hasMoreElements()
Test if this Enumeration has more elements.
nextElement()
Get the next element in this Enumeration.

ArrayEnumeration 
  public ArrayEnumeration(Object array[])
Construct an Enumeration for a given array.
Parameters:
array - The array to enumerate.

hasMoreElements 
  public boolean hasMoreElements()
Test if this Enumeration has more elements.
Returns:
true iff we're not done yet.
nextElement 
  public Object nextElement()
Get the next element in this Enumeration.
Returns:
The next element in the Enumeration.
